verbs.description: With Eric Schneiderman 's resignation Tuesday over sexual abuse allegations , Trump [V: is] losing a major foe who has made the White House a chief target .
[ARGM-ADV: With Eric Schneiderman 's resignation Tuesday over sexual abuse allegations] , [ARG0: Trump] is [V: losing] [ARG1: a major foe who has made the White House a chief target] .
With Eric Schneiderman 's resignation Tuesday over sexual abuse allegations , Trump is losing a major foe who [V: has] made the White House a chief target .
With Eric Schneiderman 's resignation Tuesday over sexual abuse allegations , Trump is losing [ARG0: a major foe] [R-ARG0: who] has [V: made] [ARG1: the White House a chief target] .
